Class AdminManager

java.lang.Object
AdminManager
public class AdminManager
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AdminManager()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void addCourse​(java.util.ArrayList<Course> courses)
    Allows the admin to add a new course into the STARS system for students to register.
    static Student addStudent​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students)
    Allows the admin to register a new student and his relevant information into the STARS system.
    static LoginPage editAccessPeriod​(LoginPage loginTiming)
    Allows the admin to change the allowed login date and time for students.
    static int login​(LoginManager loginManager)
    The admin will only be allowed to log in if he enters the correct username and password.
    static void printAdminOptions()
    Prints out the 6 options that the admin can choose to do after logging in.
    static void updateCourse​(Course course)
    Allows the admin to update the details of a particular course such as the name, school, and course code
    static void updateIndex​(CourseIndex index)
    Allows the admin to update an index of a particular course such as the number of students and the lessons.
    static void updateLesson​(Lesson lesson)
    Allows the admin to update the details of the lesson for an index, such as lesson type, which day, start and end time, venue.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminManager

      public AdminManager()

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static int login​(LoginManager loginManager)
      The admin will only be allowed to log in if he enters the correct username and password. The maximum number of wrong entries is 3 times.
      Parameters:
      loginManager - stores the login details on the admin and compares if the login details are correct
      Returns:
      a boolean whether the admin has entered the correct username and password or not

    • printAdminOptions

      public static void printAdminOptions()
      Prints out the 6 options that the admin can choose to do after logging in.

    • editAccessPeriod

      public static LoginPage editAccessPeriod​(LoginPage loginTiming)
      Allows the admin to change the allowed login date and time for students.
      Parameters:
      loginTiming - the time period during which the student is allowed to log in
      Returns:
      the allowed log in time period for the students

    • addStudent

      public static Student addStudent​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students)
      Allows the admin to register a new student and his relevant information into the STARS system. The information includes the student's name, school, gender, nationality and email.
      Parameters:
      students - a list of all the students registered under the STARS system
      Returns:
      a newly registered student object

    • addCourse

      public static void addCourse​(java.util.ArrayList<Course> courses)
      Allows the admin to add a new course into the STARS system for students to register. The information about the course includes the course name, the course school, course code, number of AU, number of indices and the lessons for each index
      Parameters:
      courses - a list of all the courses under the STARS registration system

    • updateCourse

      public static void updateCourse​(Course course)
      Allows the admin to update the details of a particular course such as the name, school, and course code
      Parameters:
      course - the object course that admin wants to update

    • updateIndex

      public static void updateIndex​(CourseIndex index)
      Allows the admin to update an index of a particular course such as the number of students and the lessons.
      Parameters:
      index - the object index of a course that the admin wants to update

    • updateLesson

      public static void updateLesson​(Lesson lesson)
      Allows the admin to update the details of the lesson for an index, such as lesson type, which day, start and end time, venue.
      Parameters:
      lesson - the object lesson that the admin want to update
